name: Reap & Sow
description:
Your great city is in peril by the crystal-hungry beasts below. The city’s residents have retreated to the rocky mountains afar, but you have decided to take a stand for your home. Implement your skills in unnatural mechanics and wizardry to drive the beasts back into the depths of the dark earth...

Experience a unique blend of first person shooter action with the strategic building of turrets in a tower defence game. Take down the incoming hordes of enemies and get rewarded with crystals to build turrets to bolster your defence. Will you be able to defend the castle or will you be overwhelmed by the many enemies?
